name: Tomb Of AnuBI0S
description:
Dive deep into the neon-lit realms of Tomb of AnuBI0S! You're AnuBI0S, the AI guardian forged to protect the deity RAm from relentless Organics.

Journey through different monuments of the Robot enclave, dodge the undead forces of the profane army, defend sacred artifacts and navigate through an Egypt made of circuit boards and stone.

From the sands of digital deserts to the cores of cybernetic pyramids, the challenge escalates. Over 5 expansive themed levels, face enemies, hone your skills, and discover the tale behind RAm's divine vision.

Key Features:

Tower Defense Platformer Hybrid
Story Mode
Arcade Mode
6 Weapon Types with Upgrades
Player Upgrades
9 Turret Variations with Upgrades
Multiple enemy types
Original Soundtrack
Unlocks & More
